Package task

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ITask  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TaskGet
    Implements command get which changes a current image in the cache.
    TaskHelp
    Implements command help which displays a help message and executes look command on current image.
    TaskLook
    Implements command look which prints the current image name and filters.
    TaskMono
    Implements command mono which remove the colors of the image and set it to black and white.
    TaskOpen
    Implements command open which open the image and create an image object and store it.
    TaskPut
    Implements command put which stores the image into the cache.
    TaskQuit
    Implements command quit which stores the image into the cache.
    TaskRot
    Implements command rot90 which rotates the image and store a version in the cache.
    Tasks
    Encapsulates the command map.
    TaskSave
    Implements command save which saves the image in a file.
    TaskScript
    Implements command script which open a file, read it and executes every command in the script file.
    TaskUndo
    Implements command undo which removes the last filter applied using the cache rollback functionality.
